title: PlayStation Coming to Netflix?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.16.21
description:
A datamine makes it look like PlayStation games are coming to Netflix. Do you believe it? Does Janet Garcia believe it? Does Greg secure a Steam Deck during this show? Let's find out! 

Follow Janet: https://twitter.com/Gameonysus

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack!
The Roper Report   -
00:11:56 - PlayStation Coming to Netflix?! Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:20:00 - Rainbow Six Extraction AND Riders Republic Delayed
00:27:50 - STEAM DECK FOLLOW-UPS!
00:35:35 - Could this become the swiss army knife of handhelds? - Best Friends Q:JordOnDrums (Jordon)
00:47:00 -  Ad
00:49:29 - NPD REPORT! Jeffy Grubb Gruub @ Gamesbeat
00:53:50 - You Almost Got a Happy Gilmore Game
00:53:20 - Out today
01:02:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
TUE: Greg and Gary
WED: Blessing and Andy
THURS: Greg and Tim at a special time -- NOON Pacific!
FRI: Greg and Blessing
